name: Slack Starter Kit
description:
Have you ever thought about creating a Slack App? Well, we sure have – and we’ve decided to share our process with the world. We made a space for ideation and creativity for visual people who want to dive in and create as they learn from the official Slack guides. This file includes:


  • Planning Kit - workshop your Slackbot or Slack app ideas with the included planning kit.
  • Design Kit - prototype your Slackbot or Slack app with our remixed Slack Block Kit.
  • Style Guide - customize the appearance of the Slack UI to match your team’s workspace.
